There are, however, special remarks to be made about many of the dis-
abilities that have been mentioned. The inability to enjoy strawberries and
cream may have struck the reader as frivolous. Possibly a machine might be
made to enjoy this delicious dish, but any attempt to make one do so would
be idiotic. What is important about this disability is that it cont
